name: Jumpscare
description: Randomly jumpscares you when you die

from_percent.name: Jumpscare after (%)
from_percent.description: Only triggers the jumpscare after a certain percentage

from_time.name: Jumpscare after (s)
from_time.description: Only triggers the jumpscare after a certain time

only_from_0.name: Only from 0%
only_from_0.description: Whether the jumpscare gets triggered if you are in practice/testmode or not

full_volume.name: Full Volume
full_volume.description: Whether the jumpscare plays at full volume or your current sfx volume
